mapper.select: SELECT m_email, cb_no, cb_name, cb_hit, cb_open, num FROM (SELECT m_email, cb_no, cb_name, cb_hit, cb_open, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT m.m_email, cb.cb_no, cb.cb_name, cb.cb_hit, cb_open FROM member m, clubbar cb, cart c WHERE m.m_email=c.m_email AND c.cb_no=cb.cb_no AND m.m_email=#{m_email} ORDER BY c.cb_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT b_no, b_subject, b_regdate, b_hit, b_grade, num FROM (SELECT b_no, m_email, b_subject, b_regdate, b_hit, b_grade, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT b_no, m_email, b_subject, b_regdate, b_hit, b_grade FROM board WHERE m_email=#{m_email} ORDER BY b_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{bstart} AND #{bend}

SELECT bc_no, bc_content, bc_regdate, b_no, b_grade, num FROM (SELECT bc_no, m_email, bc_content, bc_regdate, b_no, b_grade, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT bc.bc_no, bc.m_email, bc.bc_content, bc.bc_regdate, bc.b_no, b.b_grade FROM board_comment bc, board b WHERE bc.b_no=b.b_no AND bc.m_email=#{m_email} ORDER BY bc_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{cstart} AND #{cend}

SELECT m_email, e_no, e_name, num FROM (SELECT m_email, e_no, e_name, rownum AS num FROM (SELECT m.m_email, e.e_no, e.e_name FROM member m, event e, event_cart ec WHERE m.m_email=ec.m_email AND ec.e_no=e.e_no AND m.m_email=#{m_email} ORDER BY e.e_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT e_no,e_name,num FROM (select e_no,e_name,rownum as num FROM (select e_no,e_name FROM event e,member m, clubbar c WHERE m.m_email=#{m_email} AND m.m_email=c.m_email AND c.cb_no=e.cb_no ORDER BY e_enddate asc)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/3) FROM event e,member m, clubbar c WHERE m.m_email=#{m_email} AND m.m_email=c.m_email AND c.cb_no=e.cb_no
